name: view/editor.js
view/link.js
view/marker.js
Marker
description: Marker is class for managing the marker of one user,it includes the caret, avatar, and pseudo Names.

name: constructor
description: Marker Module manages the Carets, avatars, pseudo names for the different users of the document

params.name: origin
params.description: the id of the the user

params.name: lifeTime
params.description:
After this time, if no ping or Caret position is received => 
remove caret and avatar. if lifetime is -1 we didn't add the avatar

params.name: range
params.description: range stars from index with the specified length

params.name: cursorsp
params.description: the used cursor module for quilljs

params.name: cursor
params.description: create the caret or not. If it is from ping, it will be false else true

params.name: isItME
params.description: is it my caret ? true or false to disable the time if it is true

name: origin
description: origin the id of the the user

name: lifeTime
description:
lifeTime After this time, if no ping or Caret position is received => 
remove caret and avatar. if lifetime is -1 we don't add the avatar

name: time
description: used to store last update time to detected outdated users

name: color
description: color r,g,b

name: colorRGB
description: color rgb(r,g,b)

name: colorRGBLight
description: color rgba(r,g,b,0.5)

name: animal
description: auto generated pseudo name (from animals list)

name: pseudoName
description: Anonymous + auto generated pseudo name

name: avatarAdd
description: add or not the avatar

name: cursor
description: true for an editor, false if it is from a ping

name: timer
description: a timer that is used to check if the user is Outdated

name: capitalize
description: capitalize uppercase the first letter

return.description: [String the first letter is in uppercase]

name: getColor
description: getColor for a specific id, get a unique color

name: update
description: update the time to keep the avatar and cursor if it exist

params.name: cursor
params.description: [if it is true add update the caret position]

name: checkIfOutdated
description: checkIfOutdated check if the user is outdated and if it is the case remove its caret and avatar

name: getAvatar
description: getAvatar return the div that contains this user id

name: removeAvatar
description: removeAvatar remove the avatar of the user from the interface

name: setPseudo
description: setPseudo set pseudo  for the user

name: addCursor
description: addCursor add the cursor to the editor

name: view/statesheader.js
./README.md

content:
{
    "name": "jquery-crate",
    "version": "0.0.10",
    "author": "Chat-Wane <grumpy.chat.wane@gmail.com>",
    "description": "Cratify tool that turns a division into a distributed and decentralized collaborative editor",
    "main": "./lib/cratify.js",
    "repository": {
        "type": "git",
        "url": "https://github.com/haouarin/jquery-crate.git"
    },
    "keywords": [
        "Random Peer Sampling",
        "Adaptive",
        "browser-to-browser communication",
        "WebRTC"
    ],
    "dependencies": {
        "BigInt": "^5.4.5",
        "animals": "git://github.com/nhaouari/animals.git#master",
        "brace": "0.5.x",
        "clone": "^1.0.3",
        "debug": "^2.6.1",
        "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
        "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
        "esdoc-node": "^1.0.3",
        "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
        "foglet-core": "^4.0.1",
        "jquery-qrcode": "git://github.com/lrsjng/jquery-qrcode.git#master",
        "lodash": "^4.17.4",
        "lodash.merge": "^4.6.1",
        "marked": "0.3.x",
        "shortid": "*",
        "simple-peer": "^8.1.1",
        "socket.io-client": "1.3.x",
        "sorted-cmp-array": "2.0.x",
        "spray-wrtc": "^2.0.4",
        "string-hash": "1.1.x",
        "uglify-js": "^1.3.5",
        "unicast-definition": "^0.1.0",
        "uuid": "^3.0.1"
    },
    "devDependencies": {
        "browserify": "6.2.x",
        "brfs": "1.4.x"
    },
    "browser": {
        "jquery-qrcode": "./node_modules/jquery-qrcode/dist/jquery-qrcode.js"
    },
    "browserify": {
        "transform": [
            "brfs"
        ]
    },
    "scripts": {
        "debug": "browserify lib/session.js --standalone session --debug > build/jquery-crate.bundle.debug.js",
        "build": "browserify lib/session.js --standalone session > build/jquery-crate.bundle.js",
        "watch": "watchify lib/session.js --standalone session -o build/jquery-crate.bundle.js -d -v",
        "docs": "esdoc -c esdoc.json"
    },
    "license": "MIT"
}
name: package.json
